headline: Xylem Gears Up to Report Q1 Earnings: Here's What to Expect
summary: XYL's Q1 results are likely to gain from strength in M&CS and Water Infrastructure units. Weakness in the Applied Water unit and input cost inflation are likely to have been spoilsports.
